citations.query: color of the zone Mali in the map used to demonstrate GeoShapes using SPARQL and OSM
citations.raw_result:
The zone for Mali in the map used to demonstrate GeoShapes using SPARQL and OSM is colored with the hex value **#6A5ACD**, which is defined for countries that fall within the area range of 1,000,000 to 1,500,000 kmÂ². This classification is part of a color gradient system that visually represents land area sizes on the map. 

### References

- [1] 52b3137455e7ca4df65021a200aef724.pdf
citations.content: The zone for Mali in the map used to demonstrate GeoShapes using SPARQL and OSM is colored with the hex value #6A5ACD. This color is used for countries with an area range of 1,000,000 to 1,500,000 square kilometers.
